TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit ViewStateDisabledException extends Microsoft.Reporting.WebForms.ReportViewerException

Docs.summary: Occurs when the **ReportViewer** control detects that view state is disabled.

remarks.format: ## Remarks You must enable view state in your ASP.NET page for the **ReportViewer** control to function properly. For more information, see [ASP.NET View State Overview](../Topic/ASP.NET%20View%20State%20Overview.md).
